title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.22 - Public aircraft parking and storage area charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.22 - Public aircraft parking and storage area charges

State Regulations

For aircraft parked or stored in the public aircraft
parking and storage areas: (a) Free time. For time not exceeding one hour No charge....... (b) Additional time. For first eight hours or fraction
thereof

For each additional eight hours or
fraction thereof
(1)

For each aircraft not exceeding 5,000 pounds
maximum gross weight for take-off....... $2.00
$1.00
(2)

For each aircraft exceeding 5,000 pounds but not
exceeding 10,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... $2.50
$1.50
(3)

For each aircraft exceeding 10,000 pounds but
not exceeding 15,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... $3.00
$2.00
(4)

For each aircraft exceeding 15,000 pounds but
not exceeding 25,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... $3.50
$2.50
(5)

For each aircraft exceeding 25,000 pounds but
not exceeding 50,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... $4.00
$3.00
(6)

For each aircraft exceeding 50,000 pounds but
not exceeding 75,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... $4.50
$3.50
(7)

For each aircraft exceeding 75,000 pounds but
not exceeding 100,000 pounds maximum gross weight for take-off....... $5.00
$4.00
(8)

For each aircraft exceeding 100,000 pounds
maximum gross weight for take-off....... $7.00
$6.00
(c) Maximum gross weight for
take-off
shall have the meaning set forth in the public landing area
charges of this schedule of charges. (d) Operators of aircraft who have entered
into agreements with The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey for the
exclusive use of a portion of the public aircraft parking and storage areas
sufficient to accommodate their aircraft, shall not be subject to payment of
the charges set forth in this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1263.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
